channel.title: [317]Realm Onwards - Journey onwards with the right base. - Reuploaded!
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][u][b]Realm Onwards - The RSPS for Newcomers[/b][/u][/size][/center]
Some of you may have not heard of Realm Onwards. If you haven't, please read through [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=529659.0]the topic[/url]. However, this version is not really a 'super noob friendly' server. I made this hyperion version from this thought: [quote="kinky whip"]Yeah, I had this Idea when I was working on my real Azure source, if I put all tuts into one Azure source, and released (not as my own work), it would boost the ammount of people using Azure, people don't use it cuz there too lazy to work on it.[/quote] [b]NONE[/b] of this is really my work. Sure, I fixed [b]SOME[/b] glitches in the code, but it's [b]still[/b] 100% theirs.
[u][b]Features[/b][/u] A ground item system - Credits to Shoes. Running system - Credits to Dylan. Energy System - Credits to Dylan. NPC Spawning - Credits to Karl. A base for magic - Credits to Kevin. Item on item packet - Credits to Shamon King. A base for Firemaking - Credits to Shamon King. The gems part of crafting - Credits to killamess. A base for thieving stalls - Credits to Karl. A base for runecrafting - Credits to Shamon King. An incomplete system for bone digging - Credits to Linux. ::systemupdate for system updates - Credits to BFMV Item name support for ::item - Credits to Shoes Object parse fix - Credits to Castico. ::npcani and ::npc - Credits to Kelvin. A cannon base - Credits to Kelvin.
[b][u]Pictures[/u][/b] [URL=http://img171.imageshack.us/i/fire1h.png/][IMG]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/2168/fire1h.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img90.imageshack.us/i/fire2.png/][IMG]http://img90.imageshack.us/img90/8825/fire2.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img210.imageshack.us/i/fire3g.jpg/][IMG]http://img210.imageshack.us/img210/66/fire3g.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img547.imageshack.us/i/fire4.png/][IMG]http://img547.imageshack.us/img547/6585/fire4.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img441.imageshack.us/i/grounditemsystem.gif/][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/4919/grounditemsystem.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img585.imageshack.us/i/itemcommandwithitemname.gif/][IMG]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/4824/itemcommandwithitemname.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img402.imageshack.us/i/itemonitempacket.gif/][IMG]http://img402.imageshack.us/img402/2913/itemonitempacket.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img6.imageshack.us/i/npcspawning.jpg/][IMG]http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6450/npcspawning.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img534.imageshack.us/i/skillguide.png/][IMG]http://img534.imageshack.us/img534/5784/skillguide.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img441.imageshack.us/i/systemupdates.gif/][IMG]http://img441.imageshack.us/img441/2821/systemupdates.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img831.imageshack.us/i/teleporting.gif/][IMG]http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/3654/teleporting.gif[/img][/URL] [URL=http://img254.imageshack.us/i/yellj.png/][IMG]http://img254.imageshack.us/img254/3603/yellj.png[/img][/URL]
[u][b]Download link[/b][/u] Source: http://uppit.com/0lzijbyxkknq/Realm_Onwards_-_Hyperion_Version.zip Client: Use any 317 deob.
-Arham
